show.description: Whether it is displayed or not

images.description: An array of image URLs that need to be previewed
images.type: 需要预览的图片 URL 数组
images.description_zh: 需要预览的图片 URL 数组

initial-index.description: The index from which the image preview begins

closeable.description: Whether or not to display a close button

indicator.description: Whether or not to display pagination

teleport.description: The location where the pop-up layer is mounted

image-prevent-default.description: Whether to prohibit the default behavior of images
image-prevent-default.type: 是否禁止图片默认行为
image-prevent-default.description_zh: 是否禁止图片默认行为

ImagePreview.name: images
ImagePreview.description: 需要预览的图片 URL 数组或者单个图片的 URL

ImagePreview.name: imagePreventDefault
ImagePreview.description: 是否禁止图片默认行为

ImagePreview.name: onChange
ImagePreview.description: 切换图片时的回调函数，回调参数为当前索引

ImagePreview.name: onOpened
ImagePreview.description: image-preview 动画结束时候的回调

ImagePreview.name: onClose
ImagePreview.description: image-preview 时关闭时候的回调

ImagePreview.name: onClosed
ImagePreview.description: image-preview 关闭动画结束时候的回调

ImagePreview.name: onLongPress
ImagePreview.description: 长按图片时的回调函数，回调参数为当前索引

events.name: change
events.description: The callback function when switching images, the callback parameter is the current index
events.params: 切换图片时的回调函数，回调参数为当前索引
events.description_zh: 切换图片时的回调函数，回调参数为当前索引

events.name: opened
events.description: Turn on the image-preview animation to trigger at the end of the animation
events.params: 打开 image-preview 动画结束时触发
events.description_zh: 打开 image-preview 动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when image-preview is turned off

events.name: closed
events.description: Turn off the image-preview animation to trigger at the end of the animation
events.params: 关闭 image-preview 动画结束时触发
events.description_zh: 关闭 image-preview 动画结束时触发

events.name: long-press
events.description: When you press and hold an image, the callback parameter is the current index
events.params: 长按图片时的回调函数，回调参数为当前索引
events.description_zh: 长按图片时的回调函数，回调参数为当前索引
